hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash sudo setfacl -m user:jenkins:rwx /dev/ttyUSB0 sudo setfacl -m user:jenkins:rw /var/www/iomate/serial_switch_portconfig.log sudo setfacl -m user:jenkins:rw /var/www/iomate/serial_switch_deploy.log cd /var/www/iomate source iomateenv/bin/activate python /var/www/iomate/serial_deploy_sw_portconfig.py output/customer-sw-1-24-portconfig.deploy /dev/ttyUSB0
